Description:
We’re a global distribution company focused on consumer electronics products of the well-known brands: Nokia, Infinix, Huawei, Inoi and many others.Our goal is to provide to you the products, solutions and services that are demanded by the market as fast as possible and at sellable price offers. This is achieved through the combination of up-to-date knowledge and broad experience.We are seeking an experienced Traders in the Mobile Phones & Accessories Market and IT Equipment.Responsibilities:Analysing and forecasting the trader market for mobile phones or IT Equipment.
Procuring mobile phones or IT Equipment from manufacturers and suppliers, negotiating prices and delivery terms.
Selling mobile phones or IT Equipment to traders and distributors.
Developing and implementing sales strategies to maximize profits.
Monitoring competitors' pricing policies and responding to market changes.
Analytical tasks: sales analysis, identifying the most popular products, and forecasting demand.For Mobile phones market also:Available contacts in DAFZA, Nasser Square and Naif Mobile Market.
Available contacts with Distributors and Operators across GCC.
Ample knowledge of using online portals such as Handelot as well as contacts with their consultants. For IT Equipment market also:Available contacts across IT market in Dubai such as Khaled Bin Waleed Street, Al Ain Centre etc.
Contacts with key buyers of the local traders and distributors.
Contacts in sales and purchase staff of KDR’s.
Using online portals such as Handelot to contact regional and international customers. Skills
Skills:
8-10 years of experience in the Mobile Phone or IT equipment market.
Practical experience in both procurement and sales.
Knowledge of the main manufacturers and suppliers in this field.
Negotiation skills and the ability to close advantageous deals.
Analytical abilities and experience working with large volumes of information.
Communication skills and teamwork.
Bachelor’s or higher degree in Economics or Technical fields would be an add on.
Knowledge of Mobile Phones or IT sales logistics and commercial procedures.
Key contacts with traders and logistics partners in DAFZA or Jebel Ali.
